original_title: Moose Clothing opens first-ever store at One Galle Face Mall
original_body_lines: Moose Clothing Company has opened its first-ever retail store at the iconic One Galle Face Mall in Colombo.

The opening welcomed the entire Moose team, board of directors, and well-wishers to celebrate this significant milestone. Designed with care and intention, the store represents more than a retail space—it’s a full brand experience brought to life.

Customers can now explore the complete Moose collection under one roof, including men’s, women’s, and unisex clothing. From timeless staples to trend-driven styles, the collections reflect Moose’s focus on affordable premium essentials—everyday fashion inspired by global trends and tailored for local lifestyles.

The space itself has been thoughtfully laid out to feel warm, modern, and welcoming. Every detail—from the flow of the store to the lighting design—was created with customers in mind. The signature roof lighting design, inspired by the Moose logo, gives the store a distinctive, elevated look that’s rooted in brand identity while staying modern and minimalist.

In addition to its fashion collections, the store also features the first-ever dedicated space for Sri Lanka Cricket apparel. As the Official Clothing Sponsor of Sri Lanka Cricket, Moose offers both the original player kits and official replica fan jerseys, allowing cricket fans to wear their pride, their way.

Speaking at the opening, Moose Clothing Company CEO Hasib Omar said: “This store is our way of bringing the Moose world to life. We wanted a space where people can experience everything Moose stands for—great style, real comfort, and everyday value. From the latest fashion to official cricket gear, this is clothing made for real people and real moments.”
